data.name: Yokai Art: Night Parade of One Hundred Demons Demo

fullgame.name: Yokai Art: Night Parade of One Hundred Demons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Mature imagery. Users can unlock characters in the game where they are wearing revealing costumes and/or in suggestive poses and voices.
